languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс изгибает бровь, разглядывая железного исполина.{/n} "Один из тех миров, где публичная казнь — часть священных назиданий для толпы. Только вот описание такое, словно люди не извлекают уроки из увиденного, а ищут в нем извращенное удовольствие".

traits.locale_text: "Суд — инструмент Лекс Империалис, а не способ развлечь толпу. Такое отношение к судопроизводству недопустимо".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow as he gazes at the iron giant.{/n} "This is one of those worlds where public execution forms part of the sacred edification of the crowd. And yet, from the description, it sounds like the people are not learning from what they see, but rather, are perversely enjoying it instead."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс изгибает бровь, разглядывая железного исполина.{/n} "Один из тех миров, где публичная казнь — часть священных назиданий для толпы. Только вот описание такое, словно люди не извлекают уроки из увиденного, а ищут в нем извращенное удовольствие".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow as he gazes at the iron giant.{/n} "This is one of those worlds where public execution is part of the sacred edification of the crowd. And yet, from the description, it sounds like the people are not learning from what they see, but rather are perversely enjoying it instead."

{n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow, eyeing the iron casket.{/n} "One of those worlds where public execution is part of the sacred edification for the crowd. Except the description makes it sound like people are not learning from what they see, but are perversely enjoying it instead."

And yet, from the description, it sounds like the people are not learning from what they see, but rather, are perversely enjoying it instead."

And yet, from the description, it sounds like the people are not learning from what they see, but rather, are perversely enjoying it instead."

{n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow as he gazes at the iron giant.{/n} "This is one of those worlds where public execution is part of the sacred edification of the crowd. And yet, from the description, it sounds like the people are not learning from what they see, but rather are perversely enjoying it instead."

languages.text: {n}海因里希凝视着巨大的钢铁刑具，扬起一条眉毛。{/n}“在这样的世界里，公开处刑是人民大众神圣教育的一部分。然而，根据这位刽子手的描述，这里的人们似乎并没有从中学到什么，反而很享受这样的处刑，这有悖常理。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow as he gazes at the iron giant.{/n} "This is one of those worlds where public execution forms part of the sacred edification of the crowd. And yet, from the description, it sounds like the people are not learning from what they see, but rather, are perversely enjoying it instead."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希凝视着巨大的钢铁刑具，扬起一条眉毛。{/n}“在这样的世界里，公开处刑是人民大众神圣教育的一部分。然而，根据这位刽子手的描述，这里的人们似乎并没有从中学到什么，反而很享受这样的处刑，这有悖常理。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix observa el gigante de hierro y enarca una ceja.{/n} «Este es uno de esos mundos donde las ejecuciones públicas desempeñan una sagrada labor didáctica para la plebe. Aun así, tal y como lo describen, me parece a mí que la gente no aprende nada, sino que disfrutan del macabro espectáculo».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow as he gazes at the iron giant.{/n} "This is one of those worlds where public execution forms part of the sacred edification of the crowd. And yet, from the description, it sounds like the people are not learning from what they see, but rather, are perversely enjoying it instead."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix observa el gigante de hierro y enarca una ceja.{/n} «Este es uno de esos mundos donde las ejecuciones públicas desempeñan una sagrada labor didáctica para la plebe. Aun así, tal y como lo describen, me parece a mí que la gente no aprende nada, sino que disfrutan del macabro espectáculo».

languages.text: {n}Heinrix demir deve bakarken bir kaşını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Burası halka açık infaz biçimlerinin kalabalığın kutsal terbiyesinin bir parçası olduğu dünyalardan. Yine de tarife göre insanlar; gördüklerinden ders almıyor, aksine kâfirce zevk alıyor gibi görünüyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow as he gazes at the iron giant.{/n} "This is one of those worlds where public execution forms part of the sacred edification of the crowd. And yet, from the description, it sounds like the people are not learning from what they see, but rather, are perversely enjoying it instead."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix demir deve bakarken bir kaşını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Burası halka açık infaz biçimlerinin kalabalığın kutsal terbiyesinin bir parçası olduğu dünyalardan. Yine de tarife göre insanlar; gördüklerinden ders almıyor, aksine kâfirce zevk alıyor gibi görünüyor."

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは、その鉄の巨人を目にすると眉をつり上げる。{/n}「ここは、公開処刑が大衆の聖なる啓蒙の一部である惑星の一つである。しかし、その説明からすると、人々は自分たちが目にすることから教訓を得ているというよりは、逆にそれを楽しんでいるように聞こえる」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow as he gazes at the iron giant.{/n} "This is one of those worlds where public execution forms part of the sacred edification of the crowd. And yet, from the description, it sounds like the people are not learning from what they see, but rather, are perversely enjoying it instead."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは、その棺桶を目にすると眉をつり上げる。{/n}「ここは、公開処刑が大衆の聖なる啓蒙の一部である惑星の一つである。しかし、その説明からすると、人々は自分たちが目にすることから教訓を得ているというよりは、逆にそれを楽しんでいるように聞こえる」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hausse un sourcil à la vue du géant de fer.{/n} « Nous avons donc atterri sur l'un de ces mondes où les exécutions publiques participent de l'éducation sacrée des masses. Pourtant, à en juger par la description que vous en faites, il semblerait que vos gens n'en tirent aucune leçon, mais se vautrent au contraire dans un voyeurisme éhonté. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow as he gazes at the iron giant.{/n} "This is one of those worlds where public execution forms part of the sacred edification of the crowd. And yet, from the description, it sounds like the people are not learning from what they see, but rather, are perversely enjoying it instead."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hausse un sourcil à la vue du géant de fer.{/n} « Nous avons donc atterri sur l'un de ces mondes où les exécutions publiques participent de l'éducation sacrée des masses. Pourtant, à en juger par la description que vous en faites, il semblerait que vos gens n'en tirent aucune leçon, mais se vautrent au contraire dans un voyeurisme éhonté. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix blickt stirnrunzelnd auf den Eisenriesen.{/n} "Das ist eine dieser Welten, auf denen öffentliche Hinrichtungen Teil der heiligen Erbauung der Massen sind. Und doch klingt es der Beschreibung nach, als würden die Leute nicht aus dem lernen, was sie sehen, sondern es auf auf perverse Weise genießen."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow as he gazes at the iron giant.{/n} "This is one of those worlds where public execution forms part of the sacred edification of the crowd. And yet, from the description, it sounds like the people are not learning from what they see, but rather, are perversely enjoying it instead."
